package.name: asr_resources_for_active_scene_recognition
package.description: This package contains various helpers and resources for the active scene-recognition applications. It contains the launch files to start the simulation and the real system, the standard rviz-configuration file and databases from recorded scenes. It also contains the constellation transformation tool, the recognition manual manager and a script to visualize the current camera frustum. The python control script can be used to write tests or handle all modules
package.author: Allgeyer Tobias, Aumann Florian, Borella Jocelyn, Karrenbauer Oliver, Marek Felix, Meißner Pascal, Stroh Daniel, Trautmann Jeremias
